name: Chaotic Gnolf 0.2
description:
You are a gnome with a too long bat, which will be your weapon to hit balls to make points in a hole. The balls will appear everywhere and you can’t  raise your bat with your tiny gnome arms, so you’ll be in the middle of the chaos!

Do your best to get the highest score in 2 minutes!

Also, beat your friends in a local multiplayer mode, or hit them with your bat 😈

This game was developed in one week for the “Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2” and “Tu juego a juicio” jams.

The topics are: “Too long” and “Let there be chaos”

We hope you enjoy this project!

PD: Press ESC to pause in game.
